mapper.insert:
insert into flat_sections
client_catalog_information,
client_glossaries,
client_section_list,
catalog_code,
id,
#{clientCatalogInformation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{clientGlossaries,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{clientSectionList,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{catalogCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},

insert into flat_sections (client_catalog_information, client_glossaries, client_section_list, catalog_code, id) values
(#{item.clientCatalogInformation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.clientGlossaries,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.clientSectionList,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.catalogCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.id,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select:
select client_catalog_information, client_section_list, catalog_code from flat_sections
where catalog_code=#{catalogCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
